name: Stellar Drift (NathanWhinnery)
description:
Stellar Drift is a small groups attempt at creating a short and simple game for our University of Arizona Capstone project. This is a 2D game with a very simple story, interactions, but has a decently high skill level to play. Fly your spaceship through various areas, to find *something* and to explore the next. 

Everyone did a little bit of everything, but general roles are as follows:

Nathan Whinnery: Project Manager, Level Designer, General Programmer

Max Hekelnkaemper: Sprite creation, Programmer, UI Artist

Harrison Day: Programmer, In-Game Interactions, Script Writer

Esteban Cordova: Sound Effects/Music, Menus, Health
